text: Nicholas David Offerman (born June 26, 1970) is an American actor, writer, and carpenter. He is best known for his breakout role as Ron Swanson in the NBC sitcom Parks and Recreation. Offerman was raised in Chicago, Illinois. He studied at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. He has been married to Megan Mullally since 2003. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Carpenters Category:Writers from Chicago Category:People from Champaign, Illinois
title: Nick Offerman
